network

Class ShannonsModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.ShannonsModel

  • public class ShannonsModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the model structure required for Lab2 of CST8288 - Algonquin College. It calculates values pertaining to Shannon's Theorem & it's maximumDataRate calculations.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Larabie Josh, Algonquin College Staff (Design)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double bandwidth
      Provides a value in hertz, required for maximumDataRate Calculation.
      private double signalToNoise
      Provides a value in decibels, required for maximumDataRate Calculation.

      • maximumDataRate

        public double maximumDataRate()
        Calls overloaded maximumDataRate(hertz, snr) and returns it's calculated value.
        Returns:
        maximumDataRate(bandwidth, signalToNoise)

      • maximumDataRate

        private double maximumDataRate(double hertz,
                     double signalToNoise)
        Calculates the maximum data rate.
        Parameters:
        hertz -
        signalToNoise -
        Returns:
        (bandwidth * (Math.log(1 + Math.pow(10, signalToNoise / 10)) / Math .log(2))

      • setBandwidth

        Parameters:
        snr -

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns information related to the attributes and calculations for maximumDataRate. maximumDataRate is displayed in a 2 decimal place rounding format.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
